name: GlassHalfEmpty
0:
”Alexa, ask glass half empty to demotivate me”
”Alexa, ask glass half empty to give me a reality check”
”Alexa, open glass half empty”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: glass half empty
des: Starting to feel good about yourself or the world? Let Alexa take you down a few notches with depressing scientific facts or general demotivational phrases.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
